subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A Dodgers broadcaster since 1950, Vin Scully, 84, returned last month from an early-season illness, to the relief of those who appreciate his melodic play-by-play.
snippet: A Dodgers broadcaster since 1950, Vin Scully, 84, returned last month from an early-season illness, to the relief of those who appreciate his melodic play-by-play.
